title: SoA1:7-8
text: Demonstrate the ability to empathize with and show gratitude for others, including those with different and diverse perspectives, abilities, backgrounds, and cultures. (Collaboration)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can accept when the viewpoints or perceptions of others are different from mine.
I can develop an understanding and appreciation of different abilities, backgrounds, cultures and social groups.
I can independently express gratitude in multiple settings.
